product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Trekker Stormproof Lighter - 2012 Overstock
long_description: When other lighters fail the Ultimate Survival Technologies Trekker Stormproof Lighter keeps going strong. It's designed to operate in adverse weather and a rubberized casing makes it watertight. Catalyzer coil produces a flame that reaches 2,000degF and withstands winds up to 80 mph; catalytic lighters can continue to operate when standard lighters fail. Piezo-electric ignition sparks the lighter to life every time, even when wet. Flame indicator window glows a bright white color when the lighter is ignited. Fuel level indicator reveals fuel level at a glance. The Trekker stormproof lighter features an extra large fuel tank to provide over 1,000 ignitions. Overstock.
short_description: When other lighters fail the Ultimate Survival Technologies Trekker Stormproof Lighter keeps going strong. It's designed to operate in adverse weather and a rubberized casing makes it watertight.
